list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add IDE device streaming and manager configs
Added .idea/caches/deviceStreaming.xml, .idea/deviceManager.xml, and .idea/workspace.xml to configure device streaming, device manager, and workspace settings for the project in the IDE.

task.summary:
Add IDE configuration for Markdown and VCS
Added .idea/markdown.xml for Markdown preview settings and .idea/vcs.xml to configure Git as the VCS for the project.
